title_optimized: Premium Ceramic Front Brake Pads for Cadillac Escalade, ESV, EXT, XTS, Chevrolet Avalanche, Cheyenne, Express 1500, Silverado Classic, LD, Suburban, Tahoe, GMC Savana, Sierra, Yukon, XL - OE Replacement
description_optimized: Upgrade your vehicle's braking system with these Premium Ceramic Front Brake Pads, designed for optimal performance and a smooth ride. Our brake pads are engineered to match the fit, form, and function of original equipment, making installation seamless. Perfectly suited for daily drivers, they offer enhanced safety by reducing brake fade and ensuring consistent stopping power. Made with high-quality materials, these pads are resistant to wear and corrosion, extending their lifespan. Check the full list of compatible models to confirm fitment before purchase.
features_optimized:
OE REPLACEMENT: Engineered to meet OE specifications for perfect fit and function.
DURABLE MATERIAL: High-quality ceramic construction resists wear and corrosion for extended lifespan.
ENHANCED SAFETY: Reduces brake fade for reliable performance and improved safety.
VEHICLE APPLICATION: Compatible with Cadillac Escalade (2008-2020), Escalade ESV (2008-2020), Escalade EXT (2008-2013), XTS (2013-2019), Chevrolet Avalanche (2008-2013), Cheyenne (2007-2018), Express 1500 (2009-2014), Silverado 1500 (2005-2018), Suburban (2007-2020), Tahoe (2008-2020), GMC Savana (2009-2014), Sierra (2005-2018), Yukon (2008-2020), Yukon XL (2008-2020).
CONFIRM FITMENT: Use the Amazon Confirmed Fit tool to ensure compatibility with your vehicle.
